## Description {#details}

An <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode">SDNode</a> that holds an arbitrary LLVM IR <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>.

This is used when the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag">SelectionDAG</a> needs to make a simple reference to something in the LLVM IR representation.

Definition at line 2245 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/selectiondagnodes-h">SelectionDAGNodes.h</a>.
